Responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
Responsibilities.point1: Develop and maintain multiple Angular web applications within CONSISTE's ecosystem, ensuring high performance and user-friendly interfaces.
Responsibilities.point2: Conceptualize and implement reusable Angular libraries to streamline the development process and centralize maintenance efforts across various projects.
Responsibilities.point3: Consistently seeking to enhance user experience by exploring new technologies and methodologies.
Responsibilities.point4: Normalizing data from CSV files using Python, pandas and NumPy.
Responsibilities.point5: Data extraction per Web Scraping using Beautiful Soup.
Responsibilities.point6: Collaboration with team members to ensure data accuracy and integrity.

Achievements.title: Achievements
Achievements.point1: Developed a dynamic dashboard web application similar to Microsoft Power BI, enabling users to create custom dashboards with flexible features for presenting data integrated from public entities like CADASTUR and IBGE.
Achievements.point2: Improved the UI/UX of an advanced table component featuring filtering, aggregation, and sorting functionalities to facilitate seamless data access and manipulation.
Achievements.point3: Dynamic charts using the APACHE ECHARTS library to provide visually engaging and interactive data presentations.
